description: Plica resection when at least TWO of five criteria are present AND BOTH additional criteria are met (Evidence: pg no: 12, L589-L599)
scope: Treatment of plica syndrome (Evidence: pg no: 12, L588-L599)

documentation: At least TWO of the following: Anteromedial knee joint line pain, Audible clicking or snap during knee motion, Pain with activities, Positive Hughston plica test or positive duvet test, or Visible or palpable tender plica (Evidence: pg no: 12, L591-L596)
Exclusion of other causes of anteromedial knee pain (Evidence: pg no: 12, L598)
Failure of at least 12 weeks of conservative management (Evidence: pg no: 12, L599)
